comment.author: 49015875@N00
comment._content: Arthur Caron (29) and Charles Plunkett Caron was killed when the bomb they had intended for Rockeffer went off before they planned see en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lexington_Avenue_bombing So this picture was before July 1914
